content: this basic beanie is a comfortable medium weight slightly slouchy fitting beanie for men or women finished measurements circumference at brim band 14 36 cm unstretched 9 5 24 cm in length from brim edge to crown will fit head circumference of 20 to 23 50 5 to 58 cm yarn 140 yds 125 m worsted weight #4 yarn shown knitted in wheat knit picks wool of the andes worsted 100% peruvian highland wool 110 yds/100 m per skein needles and other materials *one 16 40 5 cm circular knitting needle us 6 4 0 mm or size needed to obtain gauge *one 16 40 5 cm circular knitting needle us 7 4 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge *us 7 4 5 mm set of 5 double-pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge *stitch marker *scissors *yarn needle gauge 20 sts x 24 row in stockinette stitch using larger needles = 4 10 cm square notes *switch from circular needle to double-pointed needles when necessary during crown shaping cast on using german twisted cast on and us 6 4 0 mm circular needle co 96 sts place a stitch marker between first and last sts and join in the round being careful not to twist the cast-on row you may also use the long-tail method or any stretchy cast on if you prefer brim rounds 1 -
